title: "go get" fails if remote (github) respository name ends in .go
body:
by **ibexris**: 
1.03 on OSX:

Try:  go get github.com/bmizerany/noeq.go

Returns:

stat github.com/bmizerany/noeq.go: no such file or directory

Now try the same thing with my (pristine for the moment) fork, but with a new name:

Try:  go get github.com/ex-nerd/noeqclient

Everything works.
